description: Try our easy to follow Passion Fruit yoghurt Fool recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Passion Fruit yoghurt Fool Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Halve the passion fruit and remove the flesh and seeds. Put the yoghurt in a bowl, then stir in the flesh and seeds with the honey.
Whip the cream until softly peaking, then fold into the yoghurt mixture.
Spoon into tall glasses and serve with the shortbread.
